name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wine Review Overlay of Distinguished Elegance

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes tasting wines and reading online reviews more fun, accessible, and educational for all.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces wine-related terminology on websites to make reading reviews more entertaining. Namely, with the word butts.
